content: I'll vote yes if you merge the sanity-check PR :stuck_out_tongue_wink:
You're so corrupt! Alright, let's see what I can do ...
I'm not even an author of that PR
I was jokingly referring to backroom deals of "I'll scratch your back if you scratch mine" :P
It should be on its way to getting merged

The funny thing is, I had already said it looked ready. I think I often hesitate to just merge in case somebody has something else to say but often, no one even chimes in. I should just merge instead of saying "looks good to me"
